purpleculture_pinyin:
zhì
(bound form) fine; delicate
(переплет) штраф; нежный
rtega_mnemonic:
緻緻RSdelicate, fine, dense
  • delicate threads 糸 (silk) being sent 致 as a present
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 致)
Ideographic: A silken 糹present 致; 致 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
致富 [ zhì fù ]: to become rich
致使 [ zhì shǐ ]: to cause; to result in
致力 [ zhì lì ]: to work for; to devote one's efforts to
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 致 [ zhì ] to send; to present, to deliver; to cause; consequence
heisig_chinese_memo: Spiderman wants to bring about a change in all of the villains that makes them have more delicate feelings and sense of compassion so they don't act so badly. &nbsp
heisig_story: The key word should be taken to mean minute, detailed, or nuanced. Its primitive elements are: thread . . . doth.
koohiiStory1: THREAD, DOTH. fine THREADS DOTH make fine cloth. Think of a Shakespearean character stating this to someone else. Picture fine threads on one side of the picture and an aftershot of a fine cloth.
koohiiStory2: fine: If the thread doth fit through the eye of the needle, it is fine thread indeed.
Ru_Words:
緻密ちみつ
  • тщательность, тонкость отделки (выработки), аккуратность
    • warodai
    細緻なさいちな
  • кн. детальный, мельчайший, скрупулёзный
    • warodai
    巧緻なこうちな
  • искусный, изощрённый, утончённый, тщательно отработанный
    • warodai
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 厶 (значок МУ), 土 (земля), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 攵 (складной стул), 糸 (нить), 至 (наиболее)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: with the thread (糸) you do (致) something detailed
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spiderman wants to bring about a change in all of the villains that makes them have more delicate feelings and sense of compassion so they don't act so badly. &nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸", " to " sound. The original meaning is fine. "Shu Wen": "Zhi, dense. From Shito, Zhi Sheng." Such as "Su Wen. "Tiaojing Theory": "If the upper focus is not beneficial, the skin will be dense, the body will be blocked, the Xuanfu will be blocked, and the guard will not be vented, so the outside is hot." "Article": "The writings of the ancients, the great material, the graceful style, the far away from the present; but the sparseness and simplicity are not dense ears."

" To " also means carefulness. "Guang Ya. "Shi Qi": "Zhi, practice also." Such as "the latent theory. "Floating Luxury": "The cloth for women in the 筩中, exquisite and beautiful, icy and beautiful."

" To " can also mean clothes that have been stitched up. "dialect. Volume Four: "Chu said that clothes without predestined relationship are called rags, and robed clothes are called rags, and Qin said that they are caused." "Jade Chapter. "Itobe": "To, sew up my clothes."
humanum_short_description_en: From "糸", " to " sound. The original meaning is fine.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「致」聲。本義是細密。《說文》：「緻，密也。从糸，致聲。」如《素問．調經論》：「上焦不通利，則皮膚緻密，腠理閉塞，玄府不通，衛氣不得泄越，故外熱。」《顏氏家訓．文章》：「古人之文，宏材逸氣，體度風格，去今實遠；但緝綴疏朴，未為密緻耳。」

　　「緻」也表示細繒。《廣雅．釋器》：「緻，練也。」如《潛夫論．浮侈》：「筩中女布，細緻綺縠，冰紈錦綉。」

　　「緻」還可表示縫補過的衣服。《方言．卷四》：「楚謂無緣之衣曰襤，紩衣謂之褸，秦謂之緻。」《玉篇．糸部》：「緻，縫補敝衣。」

Chinese Definition:
Ideographic: A silken 糹present 致; 致 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 致 [ zhì ] to send; to present, to deliver; to cause; consequence
①送給，給予：致仕(退休)。致辭。致電。致力。致哀。致命。
②招引，使達到：致病。致使。以致。專心致志。
③意態，情況：大致。別緻。景緻。興(xìng)致。
④細密，精細：緻密。精緻。

致使 [ zhì shǐ ]: to cause; to result in
致力 [ zhì lì ]: to work for; to devote one's efforts to

從「 糸 」，「 致 」聲。本義是細密。《說文》：「緻，密也。从糸，致聲。」如《素問．調經論》：「上焦不通利，則皮膚緻密，腠理閉塞，玄府不通，衛氣不得泄越，故外熱。」《顏氏家訓．文章》：「古人之文，宏材逸氣，體度風格，去今實遠；但緝綴疏朴，未為密緻耳。」 「 緻 」也表示細繒。《廣雅．釋器》：「緻，練也。」如《潛夫論．浮侈》：「筩中女布，細緻綺縠，冰紈錦綉。」 「 緻 」還可表示縫補過的衣服。《方言．卷四》：「楚謂無緣之衣曰襤，紩衣謂之褸，秦謂之緻。」《玉篇．糸部》：「緻，縫補敝衣。」
From " 糸", " to" sound. The original meaning is fine. "Shu Wen": "Zhi, dense. From Shito, Zhi Sheng." Such as "Su Wen. "Tiaojing Theory": "If the upper focus is not beneficial, the skin will be dense, the body will be blocked, the Xuanfu will be blocked, and the guard will not be vented, so the outside is hot." "Article": "The writings of the ancients, the great material, the graceful style, the far away from the present; but the sparseness and simplicity are not dense ears." " To" also means carefulness. "Guang Ya. "Shi Qi": "Zhi, practice also." Such as "the latent theory. "Floating Luxury": "The cloth for women in the 筩中, exquisite and beautiful, icy and beautiful." " To" can also mean clothes that have been stitched up. "dialect. Volume Four: "Chu said that clothes without predestined relationship are called rags, and robed clothes are called rags, and Qin said that they are caused." "Jade Chapter. 緻字的基本解释

緻
zhì
见“致”④。

緻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》直利切，去至，澄。］
(1)细密；精密。
(2)白绢。

緻字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　緻； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页932第15
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?直利切，音稚。【說文】密也。【後漢·班固傳】碝磩采緻。　又【博雅】補也，練也。【玉篇】縫補敝衣也。【揚子·方言】襜褕，自關而西謂之䘪䘿，其敝者謂之緻。【註】緻縫納敝，故名之也。又褸謂之緻。【註】襤褸，綴結也。

緻字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

緻字的起名意思

暂无。
